title: Brookfield Predicts $7 Trillion of Capital Needed for AI Growth
description: There’s about $7 trillion of investment needed to finance the rapid growth of artificial intelligence, according to Hadley Peer Marshall, chief financial officer at Brookfield Asset Management.
content:

title: Amazon adds AI muscle to connected home lineup
description: Amazon on Sept 30 unveiled the latest generation of connected products, featuring enhanced artificial intelligence capabilities designed to make interactions with AI more frequent and natural.
content:

title: China's Zhipu AI Says Full Artificial Superintelligence Unlikely By 2030
description: The AI industry is abuzz with speculation about when the technology will overtake human intelligence
content:
Beijing: Artificial superintelligence may be available by 2030, but its capabilities are only likely to surpass humans in some aspects, the head of one of China's hottest AI startups said on Tuesday.

title: Trump Visa Curbs Push US Firms to Consider Shifting More Work to India
description: Trends such as growing adoption of artificial intelligence and increasing curbs on visas are pushing U.S. firms to redraw labour strategies
content: BENGALURU/HYDERABAD: Donald Trump's H-1B visa crackdown will hasten U.S. firms' shift of critical work to India, turbocharging the growth of global capability centres (GCCs) that handle operations from finance to research and development, economists ... [4047 chars]

title: Can AI Really Be Used To Predict Outcomes?
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is reshaping industries worldwide, from healthcare to finance. Naturally, gamblers and  enthusiasts wonder: can AI be used to predict gambling outcomes? title: Spooked by AI, Bollywood stars drag Google into fight for 'personality rights'
description: NEW DELHI (Reuters) -In India, Bollywood stars are asking judges to protect their voice and persona in the era of artificial intelligence. One famous couple's biggest target is Google's video arm YouTube.

description: Like thousands of actors, Tilly Norwood is looking for a Hollywood agent. But unlike most young performers aspiring to make it in the film industry, Tilly Norwood is an entirely artificial intelligence-made character.

title: Velantra AI Shares What Investors Should Ask Before Choosing an AI Trading System
description: Artificial intelligence is moving quickly from theory to practice in financial markets. title: NDMC school students learn AI, VR and generative tools
description: Around 300 NDMC school students have been trained in artificial intelligence tools, storytelling and visuals during a three-day workshop. The initiative, aimed at Classes 9 to 12, introduced AI, machine learning and virtual reality, preparing students for future careers.
content:
Around 300 students from schools run by the New Delhi Municipal Council were introduced to the world of artificial intelligence during a special three-day workshop titled Aces of AI.
